docs.lead_paragraph: An orthopedic surgeon was charged as the ringleader in one of the state's biggest health fraud schemes, which included unnecessary operations by an untrained assistant that scarred patients forever, according to indictments unsealed Tuesday.

headline.main: California Doctor Charged in $150 Million Insurance Scam
headline.print_headline: California Doctor Charged in $150 Million Insurance Scam

docs.snippet: An orthopedic surgeon was charged as the ringleader in one of the state's biggest health fraud schemes, which included unnecessary operations by an untrained assistant that scarred patients forever, according to indictments unsealed Tuesday.

headline.main: Salesforce Plans to Give Customers Amazon-Type Analytics

docs.abstract: A well-known programmer says he’s building advanced data analysis that thousands of companies could use on the cloud-computing platform provided by Salesforce.com.
docs.snippet: A well-known programmer says he’s building advanced data analysis that thousands of companies could use on the cloud-computing platform provided by Salesforce.com.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tennessee Titans wide receiver Justin Hunter was found not guilty on Tuesday of committing assault and battery in a crowded bar in his hometown over the July 4 weekend.

headline.main: Titans Wide Receiver Hunter Found Not Guilty of Assault
headline.print_headline: Titans Wide Receiver Hunter Found Not Guilty of Assault

docs.snippet: Tennessee Titans wide receiver Justin Hunter was found not guilty on Tuesday of committing assault and battery in a crowded bar in his hometown over the July 4 weekend.

docs.lead_paragraph: Medical technology is increasingly effective, letting us keep track of conditions and even save lives. But there are risks in overuse, too.

headline.main: What I Learned While Wearing a Heart Monitor
headline.print_headline: Wearable Devices Are So Effective That Overuse Is a Concern

docs.snippet: Medical technology is increasingly effective, letting us keep track of conditions and even save lives. But there are risks in overuse, too.

docs.lead_paragraph: The private equity firm will purchase all of the outstanding shares in cash of Solera, which provides software to insurance and car companies.

headline.main: Vista Equity Partners to Buy Solera for $6.5 Billion

docs.abstract: DealBook Online; Vista Equity Partners agrees to buy Solera Holdings for $6.5 billion.
docs.snippet: The private equity firm will purchase all of the outstanding shares in cash of Solera, which provides software to insurance and car companies.
